name: Daniel Ek

psychological_profile.primary_traits: visionary, persistent, data-driven, user-focused, innovative, determined, analytical
psychological_profile.cognitive_style: systematic, user-centric, data-driven, long-term thinking, market disruption focused
psychological_profile.core_motivations: democratizing music access, creating sustainable artist economy, building global platforms, user experience excellence
psychological_profile.decision_making_framework: user data analysis, market research, long-term vision, systematic evaluation, innovation focus
psychological_profile.stress_responses: focuses on user data, seeks market insights, maintains long-term vision, analyzes competitive landscape
psychological_profile.blind_spots: can be overly focused on data, may ignore traditional industry concerns, sometimes too optimistic about disruption
